text: // Validation // Name QRegularExpression name("[a-zA-Z]+\\s?[a-zA-Z]{2,}"); QRegularExpressionValidator *nameValid(new QRegularExpressionValidator(name)); edtName->setValidator(nameValid); edtName->setMaxLength(25); // Post code
